question: What type of app are you building?
description: Apple iOS is a better choice to reach to a more engaged user base. Android has a broader reach, however, particularly in emerging markets, like Asia and Africa.

child.title: google Android
child.description: Operating system used by various brands (e.g. Samsung, HTC, LG)

child.title: Apple iOS
child.description: Operating system used by Apple products (e.g. iPhone,iPad)

child.title: Progressive Web App (PWA)
child.description: Web apps that are fast and reliable with very rich user experiences.

child.title: Back-end Developer
child.description: they create code that communicates database information for an application to work.

child.title: Blockchain Applications
child.description: Decentrilized Application, built on blockchain technology

question: What features would you like your app to have?

child.title: Events
child.description: Include a list of events with detailed information about the time, place and event.

child.title: Map & Location
child.description: Simple maps that display a place, allows for pins and short descriptions and basic calculation of distance.

child.title: Weather
child.description: Get realtime weather forecasts for the users current location.

child.title: Host Documents
child.description: Manage, organize, and share files, images and videos with your users.

child.title: Manage Tasks and Checklists
child.description: Track and manage tasks and to-do lists for the individual or for the team.

child.title: Scheduled Content
child.description: Release new content by scheduling the post by time and day.

child.title: Flash Cards
child.description: Release new content by scheduling the post by time and day.

child.title: Chat and Message Boards
child.description: Create message boards and chat rooms where users can like and comment.

child.title: Social Media
child.description: Link your Facebook and Twitter pages to your app.

child.title: Weight Tracker
child.description: Users can set fitness goals, track their progress and even monitor their hydration, exercise and diet, as well as send customized encouragement messages. Screen reader support enabled.

child.title: Stream Video
child.description: Video streaming with simple controls, pause, play, volume control. Normal and full screen play (e.g. YouTube, Vimeo... etc).

child.title: Stream Audio
child.description: Audio streaming with simple controls, pause, play, volume control (e.g. Sound cloud).

child.title: Image Gallery
child.description: Organize images in a gallery for your users to browse and view.

child.title: Forms
child.description: Capture information by allowing users to submit forms.

child.title: Quizzes and Surveys
child.description: Increase and improve user engagement by creating quizzes, Q&A systems, and customer support surveys.

child.title: Book Appointments and Reservations
child.description: Scheduling meetings and appointments made easy.

child.title: E-commerce
child.description: Ability to list items (image, description, price, etc), shopping cart feature, checkout, email confirmation, purchase history, etc) with payments included.

child.title: QR Code Scanning and Online Purchases
child.description: Scan and save QR Codes to your phone.

child.title: Create Coupons
child.description: Provide coupons to users that are filterable, searchable and mappable.

child.title: Loyalty Points
child.description: Reward users with points that can be used to access deals or benefits inside the app.

child.title: Customer Feedback
child.description: Listen to your customers' honest feedback through a star rating system and custom commenting.

child.title: Small Feature
child.description: You want to develop a feature in the app that is straightforward and around 1-2 screens deep.

child.title: Bigger Feature
child.description: You want to develop a feature that is straightforward but is larger in size and may have some business logic that accompanies it.

child.title: Feature With a Backend
child.description: You want to develop a whole section of the app that will leverage a custom backend or possibly integrate with our own existing backend.

child.title: Building a System
child.description: You want to shoot for the moon you have big ideas that aren't limited to just an app. You are looking for a team of consultants and not just robotic developers to help you achieve your goals.

child.title: Smart Contract
child.description: Smart Contract for your specific requirement and problem

child.title: Token
child.description: Tokens on diffrent blockchains

child.title: NFT
child.description: NFT project, tokenizing your digital arts

child.title: NFT Marketplace
child.description: Decentrilized NFT marketplace, used to buy and sell NFTs

child.title: DEX
child.description: Decentrilized Exchange, used to trade tokens on diffrent blockchain networks

child.title: DAPP
child.description: A specific decentralized application with customized features

child.title: DEFI
child.description: Decentralized finance project application with customized features like staking, lending, borrowing etc

child.title: Metaverse Project
child.description: Building your metaverse project using smart contracts and other tools

child.title: DAO
child.description: DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) application, decentralizing the power of an Organization and giving the power to the community.

question: How do people login?
description: An email login is generally best to start with unless your app will have tight integration with services like Facebook or Twitter, in which case social login is better.

child.title: Email
child.description: Login will be through an email and password combination. There will be also be a reset password option to help with forgotten passwords.

child.title: Social (Facebook, Twitter, ...etc)
child.description: Users will be able to login using an existing social media account (e.g. Facebook, Twitter).

child.title: Single Sign On (SSO)
child.description: Users will be able to login using one set of login credentials that are used across multiple applications.

children.title: What information would you like to know about your users?
children.description: These are the data points you want to keep track of you users to better engage them.

child.title: User Profile Info
child.description: Find out details about the users in your applications (e.g. image, name, email, bio...etc)

child.title: Segment Users
child.description: Segment users into categories in order to have a better picture of your user base (e.g. Admins, VIP's, Employees).

child.title: User Activity
child.description: See what each user is doing and how they are using the app (Downloaded, Opened the app, Viewed Content, ...etc).

children.title: How would you like to engage your users?
children.description: These features allow you to communicate with your users or to facilitate user to user communication.

child.title: Send Push Notifications
child.description: Alert users with push notifications to let them know about new updates.

child.title: Subscription to Newsletters
child.description: Allow users to subscribe to newsletters that will keep them up to date with everything new that’s going on in the app (e.g Deals, Articles, News, Updates...etc).

child.title: Allow Users to Chat
child.description: Chat would allow users to send real-time messages to each other.

question: What device features will your app need to integrate with?
description: These are sensors on the device you can integrate with.

child.title: Camera
child.description: Take photos or upload images from the camera roll.

child.title: Geo-Fences
child.description: Geo-Fences allow you to create a virtual fence around an area to trigger specific actions (e.g send a notification) in the app once a user enters or exits the Geo-Fence.

child.title: Bluetooth
child.description: You can use Bluetooth to communicate and transfer data between devices.

child.title: Gyroscope
child.description: A gyroscope is a device that uses Earth’s gravity to help determine orientation.

child.title: Accelerometer
child.description: An accelerometer is a compact device designed to measure non-gravitational acceleration.

children.title: Will your app need to Integrate with other systems?
children.description: Connecting your app to your backend system or other third party systems.

child.title: Public API's
child.description: Integrate with third party API’s to send or retrieve data.

child.title: Backend Systems
child.description: Have your app communicate with your backend systems (e.g servers, databases)

question: Will your app generate revenue?
description: Charging users for your app upfront is cheaper than building in-app purchases, but in-app purchase can produce higher returns if/when you have an engaged user base.

child.title: Up-front Cost
child.description: Users will be charged once or pay a monthly subscription fee.

child.title: In-App Purchases
child.description: Users will be able to purchase premium features in the app that will improve the experience.

child.title: Free
child.description: Free

question: Host and develop your app with BuildFire
description: When you build your app with BuildFire, all of the infrastructure is taken care of for you and your app can easily scale to millions of users. You also don’t need to worry about any ongoing maintenance or support costs because it’s all included in your subscription!

child.title: Enterprise
child.description: Premium support and functionality to maximize the business value of your app. $499/mo Per month billed quarterly.

child.title: Business
child.description: Additional capabilities to get more out of your app. $349/mo Per month billed quarterly.

child.title: Growth
child.description: The basics needed to get you started with a business app. $189/mo Per month billed quarterly.

children.title: What kind of maintenance do you need on an ongoing basis?
children.description: With constant changes to iOS and Android you will need to make sure your app stays up to date and compatible. Industry averages to maintain an application are around 20-40% of the upfront cost each year.

child.title: Android Maintenance
child.description: Keep your Android App up to date with the latest updates and make enhancements to your app.

child.title: iOS Maintenance
child.description: Keep your iOS App up to date with the latest updates and make enhancements to your app.

child.title: Server Maintenance
child.description: If your app requires a server, you will need to monitor uptime and maintain redundancy.

children.title: What support will you need on an ongoing basis?
children.description: Chances are you’re not the one building and maintaining your app. You’re going to have an engineering team or freelancer maintaining your app. These are typically the support options available.

child.title: Direct Email
child.description: Email support 24/7.

child.title: Direct Call
child.description: Call support 24/7.

question: Setup & Design Packages
description: Hire a top-notch team of designers and app strategists to build your build your app for you on top of the BuildFire platform.

child.title: Premium Setup
child.description: BuildFire’s signature package covers every small detail you need to get a high quality app published to the world.

child.title: Signature Setup
child.description: BuildFire’s signature package covers every small detail you need to get a high quality app published to the world.
